publicationStmt.publisher: Inprynted at London in the Powltry by Rychard Kele, dwellyng at the longe shop vnder Saynt Myldredes Chyrche,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Kele by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imprint date suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
